H0.text: Bar graph is the best way to show the percent gas composition in Earth's atmosphere.

H1.text: Line graph is the best way to show the percent gas composition in Earth's atmosphere.

H2.text: Pie chart is the best way to show the percent gas composition of Earth's atmosphere.

H3.text: A scatterplot is the best way to show the percent gas composition in Earth's atmosphere.

A4.text: Bar charts do not need to have separate legends, and can display other values such as averages or targets at the same time.

A5.text: Statisticians generally regard pie charts as a poor method of displaying information, and they are uncommon in scientific literature.
